body.p:
1st Cav
Head Qts 13th Ky Cav
Columbia Dec 26th
John Boyle
Ajt Genl Ky.

I have arrested Moses Huddleston 2 Lt Co. C. 13th Ky Cav as a deserter from 1st Ky Cavalry. and forwarded him to his regiment I recommend Henry Turner as 2d Lt instead he ^Huddleston^ had never been mustered into service in this Regiment

Very Resply
J. W. Weatherford
Col 13th Ky Cav

Henry Turner com 2 Lieut Coy C. 13 Cavy Decr 26. 1863
1.2.3.4.5.

13 Cavy
Lt. Turner
Coms issd & forwd Decr 30. 1863
